column5: Does Ontario have a hunting forum? I am trying to find an outfitter to use for my 1st trip hunting trip to the provinces.  Thank you!

Need more information? What do you want to hunt for? You say "the provinces" but where? There are a few thousand miles to choose from.  This may be a fishing board but many of us are hunters also and would be happy to try to help you.
In Alberta here. Our main hunting forum is www.outdoorsmenforum.ca  Lots of people there to help you out. What are you looking to hunt for?
